name: Furious Angels
description: Furious Angels is a brutal score attack shooter with different waves each day. Compete on the leaderboards, transform into a flying tank and shred the skies to pieces!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP SP2+ Процессор: SSE2 instruction set support Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 100 MB
